title: Sundaram Home Finance eyes Rs 450 cr disbursements in Maharashtra this year
description: Sundaram Home Finance currently has six branches in Maharashtra and would offer home loans targeting the mid-segment of the market with an average ticket size of Rs 40 lakh. The company achieved disbursements of over Rs 100 crore in Pune last financial year.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
